data.eml:eml: A redescription of Protolimnesia longa Besch, 1963 from Bolivia, with the first description of the female (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Limnesiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Smit, Harry, Datry, Thibault (2016): A redescription of Protolimnesia longa Besch, 1963 from Bolivia, with the first description of the female (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Limnesiidae). Zootaxa 4121 (1): 81-84, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4121.1.7
